original_text: Because of that, the name of the place became ‘Beersheba’, because the two men made a promise there.
korean_text: 두 사람이 거기서 서로 맹세하였으므로 그 곳을 브엘세바라 이름하였더라

sentences.original_text: the name of the place became 'Beersheba'
because the two men made a promise there
sentences.korean_translation: 두 사람이 그곳에서 약속을 맺었기 때문이다
